version_description:
СПАСИБО ЧТО ВЫ С НАМИ (◕‿◕)

◕ МЕЛКИЕ УЛУЧШЕНИЯ ДИЗАЙНА
◕ ОПТИМИЗИРОВАНО ДЛЯ IOS 11, iPhone 8, 8 Plus & iPhone X

ДРУЗЬЯ ПИШИТЕ СВОИ ОТЗЫВЫ!

СПАСИБО ЧТО ВЫ С НАМИ (◕‿◕)

◕ МЕЛКИЕ УЛУЧШЕНИЯ ДИЗАЙНА
◕ ОПТИМИЗИРОВАНО ДЛЯ IOS 11, iPhone 8, 8 Plus & iPhone X

ДРУЗЬЯ ПИШИТЕ СВОИ ОТЗЫВЫ!

BEST RADIO 2019

Hello! I got a long-awaited update ... let's go
- Removed ads in the list of radio stations
- Fixed a bug with adding stations to the "favorites", now the added station immediately moves to the very top of the list
- Added button "report about the problem" in cases if the station stopped working, I will immediately find out the reasons and correct!
- New application icon!
- Added new color themes
- Support for new iPhone X / XS / XR / XS MAX
- iOS 12 support

Write your feedback and wishes, I will add them in new versions !!!
All the love, your developer Alex

Write your feedback and wishes, I will add them in new versions !!!
All the love, your developer Alex

BEST RADIO 2019

Hello! We have a new update, let's go ...
- Removed ads in the list of radio stations
- Fixed minor bugs
- Fixed showing suggestions for PRO users
- Returned the old icon
If you like a new one please leave your comments in reviews.
- Added new color themes
- Support for new iPhone X / XS / XR / XS MAX
- iOS 12 support

Write your feedback and wishes, I will add them in new versions !!!

Which icon do you like new / old? Write your comment please.

I love everyone, your developer Alexey

BEST RADIO 2019

Hello! We have a new update, let's go ...
- New Icon
- Fixed sudden switching to the next station
- Fixed minor bugs
- Added new color themes
- Support for new iPhone X / XS / XR / XS MAX
- Support iOS 12, we get to iOS 13

Write your feedback and wishes, I will add them in new versions !!!

Not enough for your favorite radio station? write to the reviews - add all, just do not need to put a few stars and blackmail as MARUS FM!

Be kinder, put 5 stars! I love everyone, your developer Alexey

BEST RADIO 2019

Hello!
Thank you very much for your support in purchasing the PREMIUM version and especially the pleasant reviews. I am inspired!

- Added the long-awaited creation of my own list of radio stations. Just mark with your heart the station what you like and it will be available on all your devices in your FAVORITE playlist.
- Added the ability to change the order of stations in the favorites, you asked I did!
- New icon
- Fixed minor bugs and reduced already not noticeable ads
- Added new color themes
- Support for the new iPhone X / XS / XR / XS MAX
- Support for iOS 12, move to iOS 13

Write your feedback and wishes, I will add them in new versions !!!

Missing your favorite radio station? write in the reviews - add all!

Be kinder, put 5 stars! I love everyone, your developer Alexey

- Support for iOS 13, the new iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro, getting ready for the Apple Watch, do you need?
